cobbler noun
(FOOD)
[ C or U ] mainly US a dish cooked in the oven that consists of cooked food, usually fruit, with a thick bread-like mixture on top: For dessert there was peach cobbler. See also
slump noun (FOOD)
NightAndDayImages/E+/Getty Images /GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a selection of home-baked pies and cobblers.There's apple cobbler and ice cream.With this lovely summery dish, try a berry cobbler for dessert. On the menu you will find everything from spaghetti bolognese to seafood cobbler.
